item.title: Buttons

item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

i see 2 attack buttons, when im on normal mopar client i see walk here
how can i change this in the client or in server?
and i tried to delete The stats buttons but it gave me 100 errors

And this is what i tried to delete

if(playerRights == 0) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Stats"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }
